author: Peter Stein

changelog.release_notes:
Bug fixes.
First release for Pebble Time 2. Will make a update later with better layout for this.

V1.2
Support for Pebble 2.
At some races the qualification would run for 5 minutes while the mains would be longer. So I had to adjust the race duration all the time. To make it easier to change the setting the app now supports profiles. A profile is a set of settings. 5 profiles are supported for now.
To select a profile use the UP button; 1 click for profile 1, 2 for profile 2 etc. You can also hold the button and it will auto increment.
First Release: Support all three platforms.

description:
rcTimer is a customized timer for RC drivers using vibrator to notify driver while he/she is racing.
It has three timers:
- Pre race timer. This is the time before the race starts. Fx when race director says" 5 seconds to start!".
- Race timer. This is the main race timer.
- After race timer. This tells you how long time has elapsed since the race timer expired.
Each timer can be configured and vibration interval can also be set. Fx vibrate for each 1 min.
End of Race vibration can also be set to different patterns.
At some races mains are running longer that qualification, so it is possible to store up to settings in a profile. 5 profiles are available. Profiles can easily be selected from the main screen.

latest_release.release_notes:
Bug fixes.
First release for Pebble Time 2. Will make a update later with better layout for this.

title: rcTimer
